comment: This is generated by ESQL's AbstractFunctionTestCase. Do not edit it. See ../README.md for how to regenerate it.
name: add
description:
Add two values. In case of numeric fields, if either field is multivalued then the result is `null`.
For dense_vector operations, both arguments should be dense_vectors. Inequal vector dimensions generate null result.

params.name: lhs
params.description: A numeric value, dense_vector or a date time value.
